description:
Oota invites Kashiwada to a horror movie hoping to see her freak out. Is it a date?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kashiwada-san and Oota-kun`s Date / Kashiwada-san and the Abandoned Cat / Kashiwada-san`s Birthday
Kashiwada-san to Oota-kun no Date / Kashiwada-san to Suteneko / Kashiwada-san no Tanjoubi
柏田さんと太田君のデート / 柏田さんと捨て猫 / 柏田さんの誕生日
